farFrom.en: The movie was far from boring.
His explanation was far from clear.
The weather is far from perfect today.
The test was far from easy.
The problem is far from simple.
The room is far from clean.
The result was far from good.
Her voice was far from loud.
The soup is far from hot.
The story was far from true.
The answer is far from correct.
The road was far from safe.
My house is far from the school.

howLong.en: How long is your summer vacation?
How long do I have to wait?

I wanna.en: I wanna go home.
I wanna go on a trip.
I wanna quit my job.
I wanna eat something sweet.
I wanna watch a movie tonight.
I wanna take a nap.
I wanna buy a new cell phone.
I wanna talk to you.
I wanna try that new restaurant.
I wanna travel next month.

I wanna.ko: 이 프로젝트 너랑 같이 하고 싶어.
I wanna.en: I wanna work on this project with you.
I don't wanna go to work today.
I don't wanna go back.
I don't wanna talk about it.
I don't wanna eat anything right now.
I don't wanna argue with you.
I don't wanna miss the bus.
I don't wanna go outside.
I don't wanna disappoint you.
I don't wanna do this alone.
I don't wanna waste time.
